releaseNotes:
* 1.3
* DbServiceProvider now implements IServiceProvider
* For is Obsolete use GetService to retreave services
* Included T4 template to use on dataset to create services. T4 name must match dataset name. Also when adding dataset clear its custom tool property. I use it only as GUI designer for POCO classes and services. The T4 will create an interface for each table defined in dataset and a service firework that is comprised of one interface and one base class exposing all of the queries defined in dataset.
* 1.0
* Streamlined connection and transaction management
* Batch query processing
* Can use ninject
* Thread safe
* Connection can be defined in .config file
summary: Trivial micro-orm implemented on Dapper, streamlines connection and transaction management while preserving flexibility and usability.
title: Dapper.Data
